item.text: Now when the Pharisees and Sadducees came to test Jesus, they asked him to show them a sign from heaven.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “When <st data-num="3798" class="">evening</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">comes</st> you <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, ‘It will be <st data-num="2105">fair weather</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="3772" class="">sky</st> is <st data-num="4449" class="">red,’</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4404">in the morning</st>, ‘It will be <st data-num="5494" class="">stormy</st> <st data-num="4594" class="">today</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="3772" class="">sky</st> is <st data-num="4449" class="">red</st> and <st data-num="4768" class="">darkening.’</st><n id="1" /> You <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> how to <st data-num="1252">judge correctly</st> the <st data-num="4383" class="">appearance</st> of the <st data-num="3772" class="">sky</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> you <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> evaluate the <st data-num="4592" class="">signs</st> of the <st data-num="2540" class="">times</st>.
A wicked and adulterous generation asks for a sign, but no sign will be given to it except the sign of Jonah.” Then he left them and went away.
When the disciples went to the other side, they forgot to take bread.

“<st data-num="3708" class="">Watch out</st>,” <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="4337">beware</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="2219" class="">yeast</st> of the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4523" class="">Sadducees</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they began to <st data-num="1260" class="">discuss</st> this <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">themselves</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “It is <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> we <st data-num="2983" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>.”

When <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1097" class="">learned</st> of this,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “You who have such <st data-num="3640">little faith</st>! <st data-num="5101" class="">Why</st> are you <st data-num="1260" class="">arguing</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> about <st data-num="2192" class="">having</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>?

Do you <st data-num="3768">still not</st> <st data-num="3539" class="">understand</st>? Don’t you <st data-num="3421" class="">remember</st> the <st data-num="4002" class="">five</st> <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st> for the <st data-num="4000">5,000</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4214">how many</st> <st data-num="2894" class="">baskets</st> you <st data-num="4983">took up</st>?

<st data-num="3761" class="">Or</st> the <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="740" class="">loaves</st> for the <st data-num="5070">4,000</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4214">how many</st> <st data-num="4711" class="">baskets</st> you <st data-num="2983">took up</st>?

<st data-num="4459" class="">How</st> could you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3539" class="">understand</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I was <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3004">speaking</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st>? <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4337" class="">beware</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="2219" class="">yeast</st> of the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4523" class="">Sadducees</st>!”
Then they understood that he had not told them to be on guard against the yeast in bread, but against the teaching of the Pharisees and Sadducees.
When Jesus came to the area of Caesarea Philippi, he asked his disciples, “Who do people say that the Son of Man is?”

<st data-num="3588">They</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">answered</st>, “<st data-num="3588">Some</st> say <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> the <st data-num="910" class="">Baptist</st>, <st data-num="2087" class="">others</st> <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2087" class="">others</st> <st data-num="2408" class="">Jeremiah</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>.”

He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1161">But</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">who</st> do you <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> that <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st>?”

<st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4771">You</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>,<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of the <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="1" /> “You <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3107" class="">blessed</st>, <st data-num="4613" class="">Simon</st> <st data-num="920">son of Jonah</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st><n id="2" /> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="601" class="">reveal</st> this to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>!

<st data-num="2504" class="">And I</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4073" class="">rock</st> I will <st data-num="3618" class="">build</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4439" class="">gates</st> of <st data-num="86" class="">Hades</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2729" class="">overpower</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

I will <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="2807" class="">keys</st> of the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>. <st data-num="3739 1437">Whatever</st> you <st data-num="1210" class="">bind</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> will have <st data-num="1510" class="">been</st> <st data-num="1210" class="">bound</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3739 1437">whatever</st> you <st data-num="3089" class="">release</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> will have <st data-num="1510" class="">been</st> <st data-num="3089" class="">released</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>.”
Then he instructed his disciples not to tell anyone that he was the Christ.

From that time on Jesus began to show his disciples that he must go to Jerusalem and suffer many things at the hands of the elders, chief priests, and experts in the law, and be killed and on the third day be raised.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="4355" class="">took</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4355">aside</st> and <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="2008" class="">rebuke</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him:</st><n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2436">God forbid</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>! <st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> must <st data-num="3756">not</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">happen</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>!”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="4762" class="">turned</st> and <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>, “<st data-num="5217">Get</st> <st data-num="3694" class="">behind</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="4567" class="">Satan</st>! You <st data-num="1510">are</st> a <st data-num="4625" class="">stumbling block</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> you are <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5426">setting</st> your <st data-num="5426" class="">mind</st> on <st data-num="2316" class="">God’s</st> <st data-num="3588">interests</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> on <st data-num="444">man’s</st>.”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st>, “<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wants</st> to <st data-num="2064" class="">become</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3694" class="">follower</st>,<n id="1" /> he must <st data-num="533" class="">deny</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>, <st data-num="142" class="">take up</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4716" class="">cross</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="190" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3739">whoever</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">wants</st> to <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="622" class="">lose</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3739">whoever</st> <st data-num="622" class="">loses</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st> <st data-num="1752" class="">because of</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="3" /> will <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> does it <st data-num="5623" class="">benefit</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> he <st data-num="2770" class="">gains</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2210" class="">forfeits</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st>? <st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> can a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> in <st data-num="465" class="">exchange</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st>?
For the Son of Man will come with his angels in the glory of his Father, and then he will reward each person according to what he has done.
I tell you the truth, there are some standing here who will not experience death before they see the Son of Man coming in his kingdom.”
